imdb.plot outline: Johannesburg-born Floyd Jackson works with Dublin Bus and marshals buses on Eden Quay. Summing Kasing came to Ireland from Hong Kong as a student over 20 years ago and runs the Chinese Cultural Academy on Parnell Square. Leo Oosterweghel, originally from Holland, is director of Dublin Zoo and has travelled the world working in different zoos. These are just three stories amongst those in The Richness of Change.
imdb.title: The Richness of Change
plot: A series of one-minute films offering a snapshot of contemporary Ireland and documenting the stories of individual immigrants to Ireland.::Programme Editor

Johannesburg-born Floyd Jackson works with Dublin Bus and marshals buses on Eden Quay. Summing Kasing came to Ireland from Hong Kong as a student over 20 years ago and runs the Chinese Cultural Academy on Parnell Square. Leo Oosterweghel, originally from Holland, is director of Dublin Zoo and has travelled the world working in different zoos. These are just three stories amongst those in _The Richness of Change_ (qv).::Programme Editor
